mapper.select: SELECT po.*, mb.mmNickname, bd.bdName FROM post po JOIN member mb ON po.postWriter = mb.mmSeq JOIN board bd ON po.postBoard = bd.bdSeq WHERE 1=1
SELECT po.*, up.* FROM post po JOIN upload up ON po.postSeq = up.upPostSeq WHERE po.postWriter = #{shOption}
SELECT COUNT(*) as luvCount, po.*, up.* FROM post po JOIN upload up ON po.postSeq = up.upPostSeq JOIN luv luv ON luv.luvPostId = po.postSeq GROUP BY luv.luvPostId ORDER BY luvCount DESC LIMIT #{i}
SELECT po.*, up.*, mm.mmNickname ,mm.mmSeq FROM post po JOIN upload up ON po.postSeq = up.upPostSeq JOIN member mm ON po.postWriter = mm.mmSeq WHERE #{i} = po.postSeq
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post WHERE 1=1 AND postDelNy = 0
SELECT postSeq FROM post ORDER BY postSeq DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post post JOIN luv luv ON post.postSeq = luv.luvPostId WHERE luv.luvWriter = #{loginUserSeq} AND post.postSeq = #{postSeq}
SELECT upmPath as upPath ,upmUuidName as upUuidName FROM uploadMemberProfile WHERE upmMemberSeq = #{i} AND upmDelNy = 0
